ai.summary: Stage 02 of the London to Walsingham long-distance route covers 47.3 km from London toward the Walsingham area. It is rated hard and combines urban initial sections with long rural and woodland stretches. Expect sustained exertion, varied surfaces, and changing weather.
ai.terrain_summary: This stage mixes urban sidewalks, river or canal paths, gravel tracks, muddy bridleways, and forest trails. Expect a mix of tarmac, compact earth, and exposed fields; elevation is rolling with occasional steep sections. Conditions can be damp, especially after rain.
ai.safety_notes: Do not underestimate the distance: plan for a full-day effort with potential 10–14 hours of hiking. UK weather is changeable—carry waterproofs and warm layers. Have a map or GPS, know your exit points, stay hydrated, and share your plans. Use caution on exposed ridges and after dark; ensure adequate lighting if finishing late.
recommended_gear: Map and compass or GPS device
Headlamp or flashlight with extra batteries

seo.title: London to Walsingham Stage 02 – 47.3 km Hard Hike Guide
seo.meta_description: Detailed guide for Stage 02 of the London to Walsingham hike. 47.3 km; hard difficulty; terrain notes, safety tips, and gear checklist.
seo.h1: London to Walsingham – Stage 02 (47.3 km, Hard)
